portfolio.title: SageAI
portfolio.description: A web application that facilitates the creation of personal accounts and allows users to submit their health data for disease diagnosis using advanced artificial intelligence & machine learning techniques.

portfolio.title: Buyyit
portfolio.description: A commercial-grade web interface for a classified advertisements website tailored specifically for Toronto Metropolitan University students.

portfolio.title: RentARyde
portfolio.description: Rent-A-Ryde is a car rental service based in Toronto, Canada. To facilitate business in an online setting, Rent-A-Ryde employs the use of an extensive database to document vehicles, customers, warehouses, employees as well as rental history.

portfolio.title: AthletX
portfolio.description: AthletX is a platform that allows customers to purchase sports goods from various departments of a store through an online interface. The platform offers a simple. quick and secure way of shopping. The system will use a user-friendly interface where customers can browse products, place orders, track deliveries and make payments.

portfolio.title: Weathery
portfolio.description: A simple weather app with a user-friendly and visually appealing tool that provides the users a real-time weather information for cities around the world.

portfolio.title: Personal Website
portfolio.description: Created and Design my own portfolio to showcase my skills, experiences and projects.

portfolio.title: Handwriting Digits Recognition
portfolio.description: Developed a neural network using Keras to classify handwritten digits, incorporating ReLu-activated hidden layers and softmax output layer, which reduced computation time by 20% and achieved an impressive 95% accuracy rate.

portfolio.title: Health Failure Research
portfolio.description: Leverage Python for data preprocessing, outlier removal, hyperparameter tuning and K-Prototypes clustering algorithm.
